attributes.additional_details: but why should people with no symptoms be told to stay at home and do nothing because the government said we cant do that thing unless we do this thing however we can do this thing but not that thing
attributes.background: It’s time to end all lockdowns because they’re clearly not working and the governments advice is more confusing than anything else so nobodies going to listen to any of the advice so it’s time to go back to normal if somebody has symptoms then self isolate

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

We also couldn't accept a petition that contained false or unproven statements, including unsubstantiated statements about the effectiveness of lockdowns.
